item.title: Weapon Delays?
item.dc:creator: @untelo untelo
item.description:
@untelo wrote:

My weps hit once in 10 secs? I think thats maybe a bit slow…
So, i need to fix it. I found this when i was trying to do so.

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (4151)) // whip { PkingDelay = 10; Wepdelay = 10; }

There were alot of these but used whip code as example.

I also tried changing PkingDelay and Wepdelay to 3 but it didn’t work.
could someone help me?

Read full topic
